verses.text: \w From|strong="H3117"\w* \w inside|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fish|strong="H1709"\w*, \w Jonah|strong="H3124"\w* prayed \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*,

saying: “\w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* distress \w I|strong="H3068"\w* called \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H3068"\w* answered me. \w From|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w belly|strong="H4578"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sheol \w I|strong="H3068"\w* called \w for|strong="H3068"\w* help, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H6419"\w* heard \w my|strong="H3068"\w* voice.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w You|strong="H6963"\w* \w cast|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w* into \w the|strong="H8085"\w* deep, into \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* seas, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* current swirled \w about|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*; \w all|strong="H7121"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* breakers \w and|strong="H3068"\w* waves swept \w over|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H5674"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* said, ‘\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5104"\w* \w been|strong="H5674"\w* banished \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* sight; \w yet|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3824"\w* look once \w more|strong="H5921"\w* \w toward|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* holy temple.’

\w The|strong="H3254"\w* waters engulfed \w me|strong="H5048"\w* \w to|strong="H5869"\w* \w take|strong="H3254"\w* \w my|strong="H5048"\w* life; \w the|strong="H3254"\w* watery depths closed around \w me|strong="H5048"\w*; \w the|strong="H3254"\w* seaweed wrapped around \w my|strong="H5048"\w* head.

\w To|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* roots \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* mountains \w I|strong="H5704"\w* descended; \w the|strong="H5704"\w* earth beneath \w me|strong="H5315"\w* barred \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w in|strong="H5315"\w* \w forever|strong="H5704"\w*! \w But|strong="H4325"\w* \w You|strong="H5704"\w* raised \w my|strong="H5704"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* pit, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5704"\w* God!

\w As|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w life|strong="H2416"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* fading \w away|strong="H5927"\w*, \w I|strong="H3068"\w* remembered \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w My|strong="H3068"\w* prayer \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w You|strong="H3381"\w*, \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* holy temple.
\w Those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* cling \w to|strong="H3068"\w* worthless idols forsake \w His|strong="H3068"\w* loving devotion.

\w But|strong="H5800"\w* I, with \w the|strong="H8104"\w* voice \w of|strong="H1892"\w* thanksgiving, \w will|strong="H2617"\w* sacrifice \w to|strong="H8104"\w* \w You|strong="H5800"\w*. I \w will|strong="H2617"\w* fulfill what I \w have|strong="H8104"\w* vowed. Salvation \w is|strong="H2617"\w* \w from|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*!”
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* commanded \w the|strong="H3068"\w* fish, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H7999"\w* vomited Jonah onto dry land.
